message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'd really value.  I'm asking for $9,000 for it.  Let me know what you think!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,500. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product.  While I understand your offer, I'm not quite there yet.  How about we split the difference and settle on $7,250?  I'm confident you'll find this to be a great deal.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,000. I'm really trying to be reasonable here.
